entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 5:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure: 97.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
